title: Day 6 Champ concept challenge - Zeno the jaguar warrior
body:
Zeno – the jaguar warrior

A warrior of unknown origin walked by a tribe of minotaurs, with club in hand and a hungry belly he thought maybe he could take just one, but his tribal instinct taught him to be just, so that he must fight for the honour of eating. The minotaur he challenged was a big bull of a warrior, In the great barrier an archipelago was shaped purely for arena fights and challenges to lead the minotaur tribe, currently led by alistar. Zeno and the minotaur fought bravely but in the end the legendary jaguar won, however instead of killing the bull he asked for help, the bull agreed “you have bested me, let me show you where our food is” although they eat seeds, plant life, the jaguar warrior was used to this due to the remote jungle where he lived, the whole tribe and Zeno feasted until the break of morning the next day. Zeno was spoken to by alistar “you beat one of my greatest warriors in battle, then showed mercy, why?” Zeno replied “I was raised fair and just, to kill an innocent is not in my nature, however I can’t say the same for the rest of my tribe, my family and I left, due to how many innocents they kill for no reason” “thank you brave warrior, may I ask your name”, “my name is Zeno a jaguar warrior from the tribes of the plague jungle, if I may can I join your tribe as a warrior at your command?” “Indeed” alistar replied

From then on Zeno was a warrior for the Minotaur’s tribe, he fought bravely and honourably repelling invaders as well as a minotaur would. 

Melee – Fighter – no resource to use abilities
Abilities

Passive – Challenge
Item – Jaguar’s Heart – an item allowing him to “challenge” an opponent, use this to target an opponent, a text box will appear on the opponents screen asking them if they accept or deny the challenge
While Challenged an arena of impassable terrain will appear around Zeno and his target champion, it will face of in a 1v1 situation, no other units, can enter the arena or attack through the arena while it is up, if Zeno kills his challenged target he will gain 15 armour and magic resist, however if he loses he will lose 15 armour and magic resist, dying while challenged will not count as a death therefore no gold or spree. If dead while challenged a Guardian angel effect will go off bringing you back to life as if the challenge never happened

Q – Jaguar Strike – Cooldown 15/12/10/8/6 Seconds

Zeno’s Club will strike an enemy with the force of jaguar causing them to have grievous wounds for 1/2/3/4/5 seconds and it will deal 35/65/95/115/125 Physical Damage (+0.25% of attack damage)

W – Crushing blow – Cooldown 18/17/16/15/12 Seconds 

Zeno’s swings his club with excessive force dealing 25/35/45/55/65 Physical 
damage (+0.15% of attack damage) stunning all targets hit in a cone in front of him for 2 seconds

E – Agility of the jaguar - Cooldown 10/8/6/5/4 Seconds

Passive – Zeno gains 15/25/35/45/70 Movement speed

Active – Zeno leaps backwards to avoid the next basic attack from a large monster/minion/champion and slows them for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 Seconds by 30%, while an opponent is slowed by this he deals 10% more damage to that target 
(+0.30% of his attack damage)

R – Charge of the ancients – cooldown 90/70/50 Seconds

Zeno summons two Companions to his side – neither can be controlled

1st is jaguar kazra – lasts 5/10/15 Seconds
Gains 10% of Zeno’s attack damage, 10% of his attack speed and 25% of his movement speed, prioritises champions for its attacks, if there are no champions nearby within his attack range (135 units) he will target any and all minions, his attacks have a cleave effect

2nd is Eagle Carouchi – lasts permanently after first use of this ability
Gives increased line of sight for Zeno (150/300/450 units), gives Zeno the ability of Eagle eye allowing him to see stealthed units, blinds 1 target every 25/20/15 seconds (deals no damage, just blinds them)

Stats
Health – 425 (+5)
Health Regen per 5 seconds – 2.5 (+0.2)
Attack Damage – 75 (+7)
Movement Speed  - 325
Armour – 20 (+2)
Magic Resist – 30 (+2)

Edit 1: 
reduced jaguar's time spent alive to 5/10/15 seconds
Reduced jaguars attack damage scale from 25% to 10%
Redcued attack range from 175 to 135 units
Removed on hit affects

Edit 2:
Q - Cooldown increased from 12/10/8/6/4 to 14/12/10/8/6
E - Cooldown increased from 10/7/6/4/3 to 10/8/6/5/4
